short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Delete all types of messages, Archived your messages & unarchived your messages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Advantages of this Extension"
1. Easy to Use: Simple interface for managing your social messages.
2. Quick Archiving: Archive messages effortlessly with just one click.
3. Comprehensive Deletion: Delete all messages and archived messages quickly.
4. Unarchive Easily: Unarchive your messages without hassle.
5. Flexible Control: Start or stop archiving, deletion, and unarchiving at your convenience.
6. Time-Saving: Automate bulk actions to save time.
7. Multi-Language Support: The extension works seamlessly in all languages, ensuring accessibility for users worldwide.

"Instructions"
1. Download the Extension: Get the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Activate the Extension:
   - Click the extension icon.
   - Click the button (click to open messages page). If it doesnâ€™t open automatically, do it manually.
3. Archiving Messages:
   - Click "Start Archive Messages" to archive your messages.
   - You can stop archiving anytime by clicking "Stop."
4. Deleting Messages:
   - Click "Delete Messages" to remove all messages.
   - You can stop deletion by clicking "Stop Deletion of Messages."
5. Loading Archived Messages:
   - Click "Load Archive Messages" to open archived messages.
6. Unarchiving Messages:
   - Click "Start Unarchiving Messages" to unarchive your messages.
   - You can stop unarchiving anytime by clicking "Stop."
7. Deleting Archived Messages:
   - Click "Delete All Archived Messages" to remove all archived messages.
   - You can stop deletion by clicking "Stop Deletion of Archived Messages."

Download the extension today to streamline your social messaging experience!

Note : This extension is not authorized by any platform.
